name: Sun Weidong
tweet: We must shoulder responsibilities as major countries and provide the world with more public goods. Global challenges call for global cooperation. China and the United States, as major countries, need to stand up to the mission, and play due roles.
clean tweets: must shoulder responsibilities major countries provide world public goods global challenges call global cooperation china united states major countries need stand mission play due roles

name: Sun Weidong
tweet: We must pursue win-win cooperation and promote the development and prosperity of both countries. China is ready to work with the U.S. to fully bring out our comparative strengths, expand practical cooperation and steadily make our cooperation list longer.
clean tweets: must pursue winwin cooperation promote development prosperity countries china ready work yous fully bring comparative strengths expand practical cooperation steadily make cooperation list longer

name: Sun Weidong
tweet: We must respect each other and ensure the right direction for China-U.S. relations. The U.S. should abandon its mania for zero-sum games, give up its obsession with encircling and containing China, and break free from the shackles of political correctness.

name: Sun Weidong
tweet: We must uphold the one-China principle & consolidate the political foundation of China-U.S. relations. The U.S. should stop encouraging & supporting “Taiwan independence” moves&stop saying or doing things that interfere in China’s internal affairs.

tweet: For nearly 40 years, watching annual Spring Festival Gala or "Chunwan" on New Year Eve has become a tradition for most Chinese families.
